alert.note: Alert for Crockett (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:24PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Crockett County through 500 PM CDT... At 424 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Intersection Of I-10 And Highway 290, or 12 miles northeast of Sheffield, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of I-10 And Highway 290. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 334 and 344. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
